omopColumns.name: person_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	PatientId,
	max (DateOfBirth) as DateOfBirth,
	max (Sex) as Sex
from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics d
where PatientId is not null
group by PatientId

omopColumns.name: gender_concept_id
omopColumns.query:
select
	PatientId,
	max (DateOfBirth) as DateOfBirth,
	max (Sex) as Sex
from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics d
where PatientId is not null
group by PatientId

omopColumns.name: year_of_birth
omopColumns.operation_description: Selects the year from a date or null of the date is null.
omopColumns.query:
select
	PatientId,
	max (DateOfBirth) as DateOfBirth,
	max (Sex) as Sex
from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics d
where PatientId is not null
group by PatientId

omopColumns.name: month_of_birth
omopColumns.operation_description: Selects the month of the year or null if the date is null.
omopColumns.query:
select
	PatientId,
	max (DateOfBirth) as DateOfBirth,
	max (Sex) as Sex
from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics d
where PatientId is not null
group by PatientId

omopColumns.name: day_of_birth
omopColumns.operation_description: Selects the day of the month or null if the date is null.
omopColumns.query:
select
	PatientId,
	max (DateOfBirth) as DateOfBirth,
	max (Sex) as Sex
from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics d
where PatientId is not null
group by PatientId

omopColumns.name: birth_datetime
omopColumns.query:
select
	PatientId,
	max (DateOfBirth) as DateOfBirth,
	max (Sex) as Sex
from omop_staging.RTDS_1_Demographics d
where PatientId is not null
group by PatientId

omopColumns.name: race_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `0`. Unknown concept
